website_summaries.verdict: Overall, this stroller is a well-designed product. It's easy to fold, lightweight, and will accommodate most pets.
pros: It is lightweight but sturdy enough for small dogs and cats
It folds easily, and users only need to attach the front wheels
cons: Users report there are gaps in the mesh that might be large enough for a pet's head
Also, some users say the wheels wobble and don't have much traction

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 35 Days, Zipper Broke, was told..too bad
customer_reviews.text: Liked the stroller first 3 uses.. Then the ZIPPER on the Netting BROKE. Delivered Jan 31, 2019, Zipper BROKE March 8th, 2019.... AND PAWS N PALS are NOT YOUR PAL.. THEY REFUSED TO RFPLACE or REFUND.. zThis Stroller WILL NOT Last long
customer_reviews.author: CCB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my senior dog and a winter holiday trip. Took five minutes to assembly, easy to fold and even easier to use. My dog seemed to like it, bonus! Used it in stores and on New England stoned lined streets, no problems. I put a blanket inside to make her feel more secure. The drink holder works well and the basket on the bottom is great for leashes and poop bags. Would recommend. Dog is 15 pound silky terrier. Great for the older dog who tires easily on trips with lots of walking. Got lots of looks and everyone asked where I purchased it, I told them Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite kitty purchase ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been harness training /walking my 2 cats, and I wanted to have a cute stroller for when I want to walk them but I don’t want their paws to get wet or burned/they don’t wanna walk. I can’t believe I found this stroller and for SUCH a great price! It fits both of my Siamese boys, both being over 9 lbs each. It’s sturdy carries them both well. I tried to get both boys for a pic, but my other was napping lol. An absolute must for any pet parent with pampering problems!
customer_reviews.author: Nis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: Suited my purposes perfectly. Shakes quite a bit if your 25 lb. dog gets really active inside, but mine calms down once he is in - he is a senior with arthritis though. Perfect for pushing him, while my other dog walks. Able to maneuver pretty easily. He does tip it backward if I don't watch it and he rushes towards me while I am picking up my other dog's poop. Still great for the cost though. I got the pink so their light colored dog hair would not be so obvious. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Okay for short term budget dog stroller
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - It is a cheap dog stroller. Cons: - Poor/cheap parts, like a kid’s toy so this won’t be around next year - A lot of jostling so if your dog needs stability (e.g., back injury), you’ll need to add it. - Hard to maneuver in small spaces like elevators (for all of you who live in apartments/condos) - Hand bumper thing still smells after months so much so that you’ll need to wash your hands after each use or people will smell it :/ TL;DR buy if you need a budget fix for a short period. Definitely not an investment piece. :)
customer_reviews.author: sea

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a great stroller. I have an issue with the front netting. The zipper is broken and I am waiting to hear back as what I need to do. The dogs like it. We went to a cookout and it is great for when the dogs are tired or just need a comfortable place to lay down. I would have given it 5 stars but need to see about the netting and there were a couple of pieces that I don’t know where they go and it says nothing in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Think twice, if it’s a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchasing this for Santa to give to a special little girl for her cat. She loved it and it works well indoors. Outdoors, the wheels fall off if the sidewalk is rough. It also has to be totally unzipped if you are going to close the stroller. If not, one of the zippers breaks. We know. It happened. Not very impressive for a Santa gift!
customer_reviews.author: Carolma

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IN LESS THAN 2 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this stroller. it's pretty and had good air vents and my dog loved riding it in. I used it a total of less than 10 times in less than two months (purchased on Sept 5) and the front wheel broke. The plastic piece that holds the wheel on broke. I contacted the seller for a replacement wheel who said I was past the warranty period. What kind of $50 product is warrantied for 30 days? Now I can't even use it because the wheel just rolls right off. REALLY DISAPPOINTED!! If you want to waste $50 for 10 walking trips with your dog then buy this product. Otherwise, DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVESTMENT FOR MY MONEY
customer_reviews.text: WAS PLEASANTLY SURPRISED THAT THE PINK COLOR WAS MORE SUBDUED I SEWED ALL THE HOLES CLOSED SO I CAN'T OPEN & CLOSE THIS STROLLER BUT THAT'S FINE. I DIDN'T WANT MY CAT TO GET OUT. SHE IS FINE IN IT THE SIZE IS PERFECT 23"LONG ON THE INSIDE 21" HIGH ON THE INSIDE. 13" WIDE. EASY FOR ME TO PUSH VERY LITE WEIGHT. HER NAILS GET CAUGHT IN THE MESH PART WHERE SHE CAN LOOK OUT BUT IT HASN'T TORN YET FROM HER NAILS. VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: 2old2care

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, cute, and practical. Everything you’d want in a stroller.
customer_reviews.text: A great stroller for a great price. Assembly was easy, almost didn’t even need instructions. My dog isn’t too fond of it, but that’s his personality. My family dog, however, LOVES it. We got it for the beach so we could bring our dog and not worry about his paws burning or him getting sunburnt. This stroller is perfect because it has two cup holders AND a storage container on the bottom for beach supplies or even a small cooler
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Quality expected for price
customer_reviews.text: The color is lavender, not pink. I am not a fan of purple, but needed to use it, so I kept it. Quality is expected for the low price. For hard surfaces, maneuvering is fine, but it’s not for dirt or sand. I do like all of the vents, my frenchie doesn’t get upset since she can see me (she’s spoiled rotten and doesn’t like to be out of my sight). For the price, if you’re not picky on color, it’s a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price! My two cats fit in the stroller just great, although a little more room would be great! Still can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: F. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog who has been very ill and was left unable to walk more than a few steps at a time. I bought this stroller on a whim when talking with my wife about how it would be nice to take the dog for walks again. It's given so much quality of life back to our dog, and it's a great product for the price. It moves very smoothly, and it's very comfortable for the dog. Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Blaise Duchannes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My babies love it & so do I! I have two kittens and they fit perfectly inside. I also use it as a car seat to take the boys on drives. I also think the product is really good in quality - especially for its price.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Nice little pet stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great. Don’t expect to to be the equivalent construction as a real child’s stroller, but it’s really not bad considering the price. I wouldn’t recommend it for a dog larger than 20lb, especially if it’s a tall skinny dog or one that’s hyperactive or destructive.
customer_reviews.author: shoppyshopperson

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Stroller for all small pets
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect pet stroller for a cat, small dog or in our cast a bunny. Easily removable bottom pad and cleans off nicely. The entire basket can be zipped up so your pet cannot get out. For taller people it is a bit low so they may need to bend down more. Overall a great produfor a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Burke

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, quality stroller! It came with directions that were easy-to-follow and we had it put together in about 30 minutes. I love that it has a couple of cup holders, as well as a basket underneath for holding things. My pup seems to love the stroller itself. She is very comfortable inside. I love that the mesh is tough enough for her not to scratch through and tear. The zippers are also very durable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy walking with unwalking dog!
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is not heavy so easy to push. My dog loves it! It has a strap inside to fasten to his collar for safety. It is roomy and lots of mesh openings for him to see out. Love the cup holder and lower shelf for stuff. So glad we chose this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: je

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for injured animals
customer_reviews.text: My daughters dog hurt his foot and had a cast on it for weeks. This stroller was such a blessing to get the little guy out in his neighborhood, checking on all his old haunts. Good quality, lovely colors offered. Reasonably priced as well.
customer_reviews.author: jujubean

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Grandma
customer_reviews.text: My mom has 6 yorkies and a chihuahua. This was for her geriatric chihuahua who's going blind and doesn't want to go on walks unless carried and my mom is 66. She was able to assemble it easily and now all the yorkies are jealous and asking for turns to be pushed in the chihuahua carriage. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with stroller upon receipt. Easy to setup and use. Very happy that it has a water resistant material and is large enough for (2) 15-20 lbs. dogs sitting up. Would recommend this stroller for anyone who had a need.
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this...
customer_reviews.text: The color and design are great. It is easy to assemble and break down. But, it’s very plastic-y. The wheels feel like they will snap and even the brakes and locks are made of cheap plastic. I got this today and have not taken it out yet. When I do, I’ll write more on this review. For now it’s pretty, but I’m skeptical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! This is the second one I buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is the second one I buy and it is sturdy material, holds my 25lb dog. Nice quality and comfortable to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My little fur baby loves this stroller. She cries when she’s alone, in a pen, crate, etc. But does not cry in her stroller. Maybe she feels safer I have no idea. But I’m impressed. And so is she. Super happy with this purchase. The only downfall is it doesn’t really like sand or anything it has to climb over. But as long as she loves is so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle, lightweight, and my maltese loves to lay in it.
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller and definitely a great value. It's pretty, lightweight, easy to use, and roomy. It has cup holders and storage on the bottom. My maltese loves to lay in it. But she is very difficult in her carrier when we take her out and the stroller was no different. She tried desperately to get out even though it was zippered and I was right behind her, pushing it. It has various openings, which I love, so that they can breathe easy. However, she managed to get thru some of the opening ,which scared me as a choking hazard. If your dog is better behaved than mine, you'll have no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Paz

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I have an older shih tzu, who has gotten to the point where he'll begin a walk and then stubbornly refuse to continue. This stroller is light, and easy to fold/unfold. He's comfortable in it and seems to enjoy it. I am definitely enjoying the freedom of being able to do my own walks with him.
customer_reviews.author: Sher R

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the light pink one. I was a bit disappointed when it arrived and saw that it’s more of a lavender color, but I still like the stroller a lot! I love the height of it, makes it easy to push, and so far it seems very durable. I love that it’s not a huge, bulky type stroller, yet there’s a lot of room inside for your pet. I’m happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes let's say pet only
customer_reviews.text: This a good for pet style for the money .Wheels are genernaric no tread hard plastic. But rest of it is good . Color off a bit but still ait pink. I took photos I can get them on here but I buy again and I'm picky . Not for more then 22lb fir sure
customer_reviews.author: H haslam

customer_reviews.title: Roomy pet stroller
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color pinkish lavender which is unique instead of regular black. Stroller seams sturdy. You can fold it down. Be careful when assembling the front wheels. Follow instructions for the direction with the arrows or it can hard to disassemble the wheels. I found some helpful videos on YouTube. Cushion cover can be washed. However I put a pillowcase over it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ching

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color and the shape. Easy to fold and unfold. I have been using it for a couple months in different a conditions like beaches and cities and it still looks like new. You can not go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Carries my baby
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this stroller is what I need to "walk" my pup who has hip dysplasia. I wish it was sturdier because it is so lightweight - fast movement makes it unsteady. My other dog pulling or leaning on it makes it unsteady.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Buyer

customer_reviews.title: my cats LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: this is the best animal stroller!!! my adult cat and baby cat both fit together comfortably. they LOVE going in it. it has 2 awesome drink holders and a compartment underneath. it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: bailey cristine

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pink stroller, it came with the worst directions (even misspelled words). The directions were very small and honestly didn’t make sense. The folding instructions say to “release the red locking latch” of which mine has no red parts. The picture offered by the company shows a different handle than what I received. The tires are plastic with no grip, making it hard to turn. I wish I got what the picture depicts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use overall. Takes up a larger amount of room when traveling than I expected, but it gets the job done. The main issue with this stroller is the wheels are plastic, but for the price it's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stroller! I have an aging Chihuahua fur child that I can now take on shopping trips or just strolling around the mall. We took it to Canada while we were on vacation and we were even allowed to take him into a restaurant. He’s very well behaved so no one even knew he was in the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: T Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Tips over backwards
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice stroller with only one issue for me and my Westie. So I bought this because our little Westie suffered a fractured pelvis but loves going on walks. He weighs 21 lbs and is a stocky little dog. When he sits in the back portion it causes the stroller to “pop wheelies” and tip over backwards. So I don’t dare let go or he will crash to the ground. A counter weight in the basket may solve this....haven’t tried. If your dog is smaller it probably wouldn’t be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother for her 2 small dogs and they absolutely love the jogger. It is very well built, sturdy and lightweight which is important for my 86 year old who loves to walk with her dogs. Great product! Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Seidler

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for our small dog.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this stroller. She would stay in it all day. It has plastic wheels so it is hard to push sometimes and the sides don’t go down all the way so that makes me a little nervous that she might get caught so I have to watch her but when we are going somewhere (someone’s house or party) or out walking/sitting - it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: It was a delayed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build and with so much space. We have 3 cats and to be honest they all can fit in there. My only concerned is the wheels. I got it for my daughter’s bday. I hope the wheels last but in general it’s very nice with a lot of space for a cat or cats.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Not For Cats or Small Animals
customer_reviews.text: Took my kitties for a walk in the park. One jumped out, I never saw him again!!!!!! Why would a pet stroller put unnecessary wholes on the side of it? Epic fail! I gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: tiffani

customer_reviews.title: The Cats Approve
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister who is obsessed with her cats. She posts video quite a bit of the cats lounging in this. It’s super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: So... My mother has two little doggies that walk short distances and has been cutting her walking time. At first, I saw a doggy stroller in Petsmart more than twice the price. Thank goodness I didn't buy it and instead bought this one. PROS: The stroller is really easy to assemble. Light, durable, material does not appear cheap, and fashionable. CONS: Not really a con but more like a room to improve is that it should somehow be made to fold for easier managing in the car. Because of that one feat the stroller gets 3 out of 5 stars otherwise for the price it would easily be a 5-star winner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Doggie Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! And as you can see, so does my dog! He weighs 28 pounds & is rather long, since he’s a Doxypoo, & it works perfectly! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria O. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: My short legged girl loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this tonight, my dachshund can’t possibly keep up with our gsd......having only used it around the house it seems pretty well made, and she sat comfortably and also seemed excited she got something haha!. Super easy to put together, hoping it does the job on our daily walks!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Collins

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this 100%
customer_reviews.text: I, along with my cat, are really pleased with this product. She even takes her afternoon naps in it. All I had to assemble was the wheels and that was quite easy to do. It's sturdy and rolls easily on the sidewalk. Definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Butzin

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller for the price
customer_reviews.text: We chose pink, but it's more lavender than pink. The clip that holds the stroller closed when folded is hard to snap in place and even harder to unsnap. If you have a small dog like we do who likes to sit up higher and look at everything in all directions, then you're going to need to use one or two small pillows which prohibits the use of the leash clip. This is still a good stroller though for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ritebrayn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pet stroller. My pet is completely safe in it and it has storage underneath. It also has a place to keep your drink. Great quality and I would highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: cowgirlup1963

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price. I wish I purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! It’s so easy to set up, maneuver and clean. My dogs love it. Petey gets in the stroller and doesn’t want to get out. Haha. It’s a great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Defect in front wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I have used the Paws & Pals 4 Wheeler Elite pet stroller 4 times with my 9 pounds Shih Tzu in the last month and a half. Unfortunately it did not' meet my expectations. One of the wheel gets stuck and does not turn. I am not satisfied with this product and will not recommend it. I bought other strollers in the past and I never had this issue before. I was told that the warranty was only 30 days and it is now expired. I asked to review my case. Awaiting for answer back. The seller stated that they can’t help me. I am now stuck with a two months stroller with defective front wheels. Anne
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller
customer_reviews.text: Finally after placing two orders (One was wrong and the other they didn’t have in stock anymore) before receiving this stroller. Good stroller quality! Can’t wait to use
customer_reviews.author: Berenice R

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t taken my cat out yet but he’s sniffed it, laid in it and apparently thinks it’s super comfortable as he will only sleep in it now, once the weather gets better you can count on us being out and about!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this stroller as it met most of my criteria; however, the plastic wheels and the attachment broke within a couple of months and the wheel continues to fall off. At this point I am not sure how to fix it. The positive is the dog loves going for rides. The rest of the stroller seems to be well made. Fix the wheels please!
customer_reviews.author: gnb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stroller. Easy to set up. Also very easy to take down and pack up for the car. My dog loves it! I like how sturdy it is and all the pockets/areas to put water, his treats etc.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Politano

customer_reviews.title: Missing a part
customer_reviews.text: It arrived without the axle. Box had been opened before I got it. What fun to deal with this.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. Welter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: It was a cheap purchase, but not cheap construction. Well made and sturdy, my yorkie and maltese love it. Very roomy for the two of them.
customer_reviews.author: lynn m plummer

customer_reviews.title: Great pet stroller.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great. My Cat loves it. He enjoy walks by the park (Lol) and enjoy being in the stroller al day at home. I need to take him out for him to get away from the stroller. I guess he is comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Seller will not respond to return requests
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work for me. The day of delivery, I requested a return. The seller did not respond. Amazon emailed me asking if I was contacted by the seller and I responded no. Seller still ignored me. If you’re thinking about buying this product, be forewarned.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Schoneman

customer_reviews.title: Small dog and crowded events, here is your solution!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is absolutely adorable. I bought this for my Aunt's dog who is very small. She lives in a downtown area and loves to go to area festivals etc. This is perfect for her because she can take her dog along and not fear it getting stepped on. It was easy to put together. It swivels and turns nice. There is a large viewing window so her dog can see out when laying down inside. She can also see inside while pushing her. Great pet stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Best pet stroller ever
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is amazing. Goes over all terrains easily. Easy to maneuver. Best of all my doggy smiles the entire time she is riding in it, so it must be super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dottie P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my aging pup
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old dachshund can’t walk as far as she used to. While taking my pups for a walk, I bring the stroller with me and whenever she gets tired, she takes her break in the stroller! She is 10 pounds and is super comfortable (as long as the canopy isn’t completely closed). I would recommend this to anyone with an aging pup who can’t hang on the long walks anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stroller at a Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: This pet stroller was a hit on Christmas day. I bought it for my niece and she absolutely loves it. It is very well made and the quality is amazing. It comes mostly assembled all we had to do was attach the wheels and drink holder. I am beyond pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stomper

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy, you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Super simple set up! My senior doggy is very comfy and managed to fall asleep in the stroller. All wheels seem to be functioning just fine as of now. Will update my review in 3-6 months.
customer_reviews.author: PurinFan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! My Pomeranian and 2 cats cab fit in it and they love it! I love i can go on walks and have them enjoy the outside with me! The only con is that its not the best at turning.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Gould

customer_reviews.title: Great product! You won’t be disappointed! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: High quality product! My dog is getting older and has health issues limiting her mobility this has made taking her out for a stroll so much nicer and enjoyable. She loves the outdoors and now she can enjoy it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LVReviewJWI

customer_reviews.title: Being honest
customer_reviews.text: Description is true.I can put my 2 Bichon Frise,one weighs 25 lbs,one is15 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: L.Huff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love going in their stroller for walks around our town! It was easy to put together and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and beautiful style.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! So does my little one Julie. She is 12 yrs old and loves to go on walks with her brother and sister but can’t walk that far. This stroller allows her to join in comfortably!
customer_reviews.author: karen cagno

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: In love with this, puppy is very happy as well! Made very well and I take it on jogs In the park.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Deck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The price was spectacular! Then the stroller was delivered and the quality is GREAT! Perfect for my little pom puppy until she gets her shots. Now she can go anywhere with us. Its also big enough for her as an adult. VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the light pink color and it is definitely more of a light purple in person, but that is fine with me. Our dogs absolutely love this and it is so easy to get them in and out of. It is a bit difficult to zip back up if you unzip the mesh all the way, but still super easy to get them in and out without having to unzip completely. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Eastridge

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, easy to use, very nice looking. Works perfectly. Just wish the tires were not so plasticky.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works so well! Love the color and it is so easy to fold up and put in the back of my car and open up when I need to!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Alysha

customer_reviews.title: Pet owner must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of this product. My pets are usually scared of going on walks but the stroller really eases them! It’s easy to clean and really easy to push around.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Never did a review in the 9 years using Amazon. But this was so great Best stroller ever! Fit my chunky 15 lb chihuahua and my 12 lb pekignese perfectly. So much room and built well. 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: alexia

customer_reviews.title: Love our stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I love the pet stroller! It was easy to assemble and it folds easily and fits well in my small 2seater Lexus trunk. It is well made and arrived earlier than promised! Great buy and it has given my senior dog and I freedom to be outside.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Olson

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one for my daughter's new puppy and one for my cat. My cat loves it! She is an indoor only cat and it's a real treat for her to get to go outside. In barely 2 weeks time I now simply ask if she wants to go for a ride and she hops right in.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Barnett

customer_reviews.title: It's o.k.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller will work for the money you pay for it. Mine is still working great and ive had it 3 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Mikester

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is awesome! Easy to assemble and cheap. My dog is 17 pounds and she fits perfectly. It honestly could fit another smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller worked out perfect for our small puppy- a Bichon and poodle mix. We have used it several times - it is easy to fold and unfold and looks nice too. I would recommend. Keeps pet safe and happy to enjoy outdoors. My little boys love pushing it around !
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gibson

customer_reviews.title: good stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love at the first sight. My chihuahua does not want to leave it. Easy to assemble. It fits my 5'8 frame perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ride
customer_reviews.text: My 2 chihuahuas love to ride in this stroller. They are older dogs so it’s nice for them to ride when they get tired on their walk.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Adorable stroller
customer_reviews.text: Very cute stroller. Easy to assemble. light weight and easy to maneuver. I use it to bring my baby to the vet. The vet tech said it was adorable.
customer_reviews.author: mjg

customer_reviews.title: Surprise! My Miniature Pinscher loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Easy to add wheels. My dog hated a different stroller in his younger days, I figured out he didn’t like being zipped in. This netting completely unzips. The canopy stays open. There is an attached strap to hook dog in if needed. The price was great. My dog is 11 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Weston

customer_reviews.title: The FIRST PHOTO is the one YOU GET. It's a cheap KNOCK OFF.
customer_reviews.text: This is a knock off of the original Paws & Pals. It's a replica that is of lower quality. The instructions are the worst and even some of the plastic parts didn't have holes that were stamped all the way through. You get what you pay for, this thing is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Young

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: easy to install even a kid can do it! Good quality for the price, I'm happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long walks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my puppy. Vented on front, back and top giving much air flow. Love the storage area under it and the cup holder. Probably not stable enough to jog with but great for walks. The wheels kind of wobble but it has a lock so they don't spin around which helped. I do recommend this stroller
customer_reviews.author: JANE

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Choice
customer_reviews.text: On the one we ordered, it took weeks before the company told us out of stock,i so we odrdered this one for our poodle (mini). Have not used however, seems pretty good, simple assembly ,but needs more testing in the malls :o)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brem

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I finally got a this stroller! My cat loves it, and it only took about 10 min to put together. I defiantly recommend this product if you’re looking for a pet stroller. And the cup holder is the perfect size to hold my boba drink and snacks 😁
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Cat stroller
customer_reviews.text: While I was hesitant to purchase a stroller for our cat, my daughter insisted. The cat loves going for walks and the cat actually climbs in it and sleeps in at night. My only complaint is that we have to use clips on either side to prevent the cat from poking it’s head out and possibly jumping out.
customer_reviews.author: Milomilo1375

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 17 pound, loves to go everywhere with me but hate other people and dogs, dog!
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy stroller.
customer_reviews.text: So well made and easy to put together. Bought it for my cats and the love it! Love the price.
customer_reviews.author: adriana collins

customer_reviews.title: Don't bribe me for a 5 star review!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think the product is great my dog loves it. However what I don't like is getting a text message asking me, well actually bribing me for a five star review in exchange for a roll of free microfiber towels. Poor business decision and a 1 Star rating that will be on record. No towels required! That's a free review.
customer_reviews.author: edward pawluk

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product for my dog (not sure if she likes it though). The cushion inside is great and soft enough for my dog. Having a strap and the mesh cover is awesome since my dog loves to try to jump out of the stroller. Its easy to wheel and fold up if needed! I definitely recommend this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: The bottom basket ripped easily. Plenty of room for my dogs and very secure for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable! Cats love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. My cat loves it even more. It keeps them safe and secure inside with the netting/ screen. Nice storage under the stroller. Like the cupholders, however they're kinda sideways so not very ideal. Overall, I'd highly recommend!!! 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Schwister

customer_reviews.title: It fits great
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to open and close up for storage and our dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Whaley

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, and the girls (2 cats, one 11lbs, the other 9lbs) like it. But lets see how it holds up! Hopefully well enough to where I won't have to revise my review.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas L Zulla

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: One Axle is 1/4” too short making it impossible to assemble! Returning and will buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nocibur

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the stroller is really does help a lot because my puppy is so afraid to walk outside still and i just wanna take her anywhere but i don't wanna carry her in the bag so i bought this stroller and trust me it's amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Kimily

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful Your Cat does not sneak out
customer_reviews.text: So far I have not been able to get my cat to sit in it. I hope in time he will. The only problem I anticipate once I am able to take him out is that there are a couple of places on the sides where he could get out if he wanted to. Before I take him out I will have to secure it somehow. But for now while he is getting use to it I wont bother.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

product_meta.title: Paws & Pals 4 Wheeler Elite Jogger Pet Stroller Cat/Dog Easy to Walk Folding Travel Carrier
product_meta.description:
Color:Light Pink

Transport your pet in comfort and style with the 4 Wheeler Pet Stroller from Paws & Pals. It's a terrific option for transporting smaller, injured, or senior pets on long walks or jogs.

Year round use: Using a stroller allows you to take your pet outdoors when the pavement is either too hot or cold for their delicate paws. The zippered entryway, mesh window shades, and retractable canopy allows for breathability and airflow to keep your puppy or kitten at a comfortable temperature.

 Durable design: Our pet strollers for small dogs are constructed with high-quality materials to withstand every day ware & tear along with bad weather and rowdy pets.

Keep on rolling: Our pet stroller utilizes sturdy wheels with full rotation. The front wheels rotate at 360 degrees to provide easy turning and unparalleled maneuverability. Our wheels are made to smoothly glide on all surfaces such as smooth pavement, bumpy concrete, grass, dirt roads, and even rocky terrain.

Extra Stroage: With cup holders and a large undercarriage, this stroller has plenty of room to hold additional supplies and accessories. It's perfect for carrying beverages, toys, snacks, and more.

Colors: Available in blue, gray, pink and beige

Features: 

• Cushioned Mattress
• Multiple mesh windows
• Shock absorption ont he front wheel
• Large undercarriage
• 3 zippered entries
• Cup holders
• Comfortable grip handlebar
• Leash clip

Please see other Paws & Pals products to fulfill all of your pet supply and accessory needs.
feature_bullets: LEAD YOUR PET WITH EASE via the front zipper entry and front footboard step or use the back zippered door to load and unload your pet. While strolling around in the convertible mode with the canopy down, be sure to use the leash clip so your pet doesn't make a fast escape.
SPACE SAVER: With the press of a button on the handle, our 4 wheels pet stroller will fold compactly. Making this a great option for travel as it takes minimal space to store when folded completely.

BREATHABILITY: Not only do the mesh windows provide your dog or cat with a nice view, plenty of sunshade and protect them from bugs & insects, but they also provide constant streams of air flow, and allow your pets to stay nice and cool while you enjoy a brisk walk.
MULTIPLE COLORS: Available in blue, gray, pink and beige.
